translation.title: Things That Play a Part in Realization

segments.en: 35. Things That Play a Part in Realization
“These six things play a part in realization.

segments.pli: Aniccasaññā, anicce dukkhasaññā, dukkhe anattasaññā, pahānasaññā, virāgasaññā, nirodhasaññā—
segments.en: The perception of impermanence, the perception of suffering in impermanence, the perception of not-self in suffering, the perception of giving up, the perception of fading away, and the perception of cessation.

segments.pli: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhammā vijjābhāgiyā”ti.
segments.en: These are the six things that play a part in realization.”
